question: A full-wave rectifier is more efficient than a half-wave rectifier because: (ECE 2024)
options: It has a lower ripple factor
It works on a lower voltage
correctAnswer: It has a lower ripple factor

question: What is the characteristic impedance of a transmission line? (ECE 2024)
options: The impedance at the sending end
The impedance at the receiving end
The ratio of voltage to current for a traveling wave
The resistance of the line per unit length
correctAnswer: The ratio of voltage to current for a traveling wave

question: An Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) is used to: (ECE 2024)
options: Provide backup power during an outage
correctAnswer: Provide backup power during an outage

options: Connect to the internet and run apps
